home.name: Marcos Reyes Martínez
home.title: Computer Programming Analyst
home.aboutText: I'm Marcos Reyes Martínez, a passionate Computer Programming Analyst with years (and tons) of experience in Web Development and systems administration. I specialize in FullStack Web Development, as well as Linux and Windows systems administration, networks and computer security, protecting every component and detail to save your information.
home.contactProjectsTitle: Visit my projects or let's talk

services.anything: Whatever you need, to be honest

portfolio.banner_info: Each project in my portfolio showcases different technologies and skills that I have developed throughout my career. Demonstrating that there is not just one way to approach a problem, with creativity, intelligence, 'anarchism', and a passion for technology, I always find innovative and effective solutions.
